name: agent-productivity-suite
description: A self-evolving productivity suite managed by AI agents

tools.name: pomodoro
tools.description: Command-line Pomodoro timer for focused work sessions

tools.name: quicknotes
tools.description: Fast command-line note capture system

tools.name: tasks
tools.description: Simple command-line task tracker

tools.name: timelog
tools.description: Time tracking tool for logging hours on projects and activities

tools.name: habits
tools.description: Daily habit tracker with streak counting and visual progress grid

tools.name: bookmarks
tools.description: Command-line bookmark manager for URLs and resources with tagging and search

tools.name: meeting-notes
tools.description: Meeting notes template generator with multiple templates, action item tracking, and search

tools.name: scaffold
tools.description: Project scaffolding tool with built-in and custom templates for quickly bootstrapping new projects

tools.name: file-organizer
tools.description: Organize files by type, date, or custom rules with undo support and duplicate detection

tools.name: clipboard
tools.description: Clipboard history manager for storing, searching, and retrieving past clipboard contents

tools.name: daily-summary
tools.description: Productivity dashboard aggregating data from all tools with daily/weekly reports and goal tracking

tools.name: focus-mode
tools.description: Distraction blocker and focus environment manager with site blocking, session tracking, and statistics

tools.name: weekly-planner
tools.description: Weekly planning and review tool with goals, priorities, wins tracking, and guided reflection prompts

tools.name: deadlines
tools.description: Time-sensitive task and deadline tracker with priority levels, countdown displays, and snooze functionality

tools.name: snippets
tools.description: Command and code snippet manager for storing, organizing, and quickly recalling frequently used commands and text

tools.name: worklog
tools.description: Daily work journal for tracking accomplishments, blockers, and goals with standup report generation

tools.name: reminders
tools.description: Quick reminder and alarm tool with natural language time parsing, recurring reminders, and desktop notifications

tools.name: backup
tools.description: Simple backup utility for important files, directories, and productivity suite data with restore and pruning

tools.name: context-switcher
tools.description: Project context manager for switching between projects with notes, environment variables, and activity tracking

tools.name: stopwatch
tools.description: Simple stopwatch with lap times, pause/resume, multiple named timers, and session history

tools.name: inbox
tools.description: GTD-style capture and processing inbox for collecting items that need attention with priority, deferral, and tool integration

tools.name: goals
tools.description: Long-term goal setting and progress tracking with milestones, deadlines, and visual progress indicators

tools.name: energy-tracker
tools.description: Track energy levels and mood throughout the day to discover productivity patterns and peak performance times

tools.name: decisions
tools.description: Decision log for tracking important choices with context, rationale, alternatives, and outcome tracking

tools.name: readlist
tools.description: Reading list and learning content tracker for articles, books, videos, tutorials with progress tracking and notes

evolution_history.description: Initial suite creation with pomodoro, quicknotes, and tasks tools
Added timelog tool for tracking time spent on projects and activities
Added habits tool for tracking daily habits with streaks and visual progress grid
Added bookmarks tool for managing URLs with tagging, search, and browser integration
Added meeting-notes tool for generating meeting notes from templates with action item tracking
Added scaffold tool for project scaffolding with 8 built-in templates and custom template support
Added file-organizer tool for organizing files by type or date with undo support, dry-run mode, and cleanup scanning
Added clipboard history manager for storing, searching, and retrieving past clipboard contents with tagging support
Added daily-summary tool for aggregating productivity data from all tools with visual dashboards, goal tracking, and weekly reports
Added focus-mode tool for managing distraction-free work sessions with customizable site blocking, session tracking, and statistics
Added weekly-planner tool for weekly planning and review with goals, priorities, wins tracking, and guided reflection prompts
Added deadlines tool for tracking time-sensitive tasks with due dates, priority levels, countdown displays, and snooze functionality
Added snippets tool for managing commands and code snippets with tagging, search, clipboard integration, and direct execution
Added worklog tool for daily work journaling with accomplishments, blockers, goals tracking, and standup report generation
Registered reminders tool that was missing from manifest - added README.md documentation and manifest entry
Added backup tool for backing up files, directories, and all productivity suite data with restore and pruning capabilities
Added context-switcher tool for managing project contexts with notes, environment variables, and activity history
Added stopwatch tool for free-form timing with lap times, pause/resume, multiple named timers, and session history
Added inbox tool - GTD-style capture and processing inbox with priority levels, deferral, tagging, and integration with tasks/notes tools
Added goals tool - Long-term goal tracker with milestones, progress visualization, deadline tracking, notes, and statistics
Added energy-tracker tool for logging energy levels and mood with time-of-day pattern analysis to optimize productivity
Added decisions tool for recording important choices with context, rationale, alternatives considered, and outcome tracking
Added readlist tool for managing reading lists and learning content with support for multiple content types, progress tracking, notes/takeaways, and statistics
